When this event is programmed to counter#1, it indicates that the input of the event programmed on counter#0 will be used by this (light) counter to calculate a cycles value, based on the counter Threshold-ing config
Counts the number of available U2C credits (IPQ credits) every cycle
Counts entries which are sending snoops or in line to send snoops
Counts valid entries which sent all the snoops or for which send snoops timeout expired
Counts all valid entries
Counts allocations to ScrubQ
Counts the amount of snoops scrub sent
Counts the amount of entries which didn?t sent all the transactions
Counts the amount of CAM hit of new transactions vs ScrubQ
Counts the amount of entries dropped before CAM timeout expired
Each cycle count number of all outgoing valid entries in ReqTrk. Such entry is defined as valid from it's allocation in ReqTrk till deallocation. Accounts for Coherent and non-coherent traffic
Each cycle count number of valid coherent Data Read entries . Such entry is defined as valid when it is allocated till deallocation. Doesn't include prefetches
Each cycle counts the number of entries which sent WRPUll (all WrPull types) and wating for Data
Each cycle counts all entries, which sent GO and waiting for GO-Ack. From the moment GO sent till GO-Ack received
Each cycle counts all entries, which sent SelfSnoop and waiting for Rsp. From the moment SelfSnp sent till C2URsp was received

Each cycle count number of valid coherent Write entries. Such entry is defined as valid from it's allocated till deallocation. Writes here denote any write transactions: full/partials writes and evictions
Each cycle count number of valid entries in ReqTrk queue that have conflicts with ReqTrk
Each cycle count number of outgoing valid prefetch entrie such entry is defined as valid from it's allocation in ReqTrk till deallocation. MLC_Pref = DRD_pref/CRD_pref/RFO_pref
Total number of all outgoing entries allocated. Accounts for Coherent and non-coherent traffic
Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches
Number of WrPulls sent (all type of WrPull)
Number of U2CRsp  (GO,ExtCmp,etc)  which need GO-Ack
Number of SelfSnoops
Number of Writes allocated - any write transactions: full/partials writes and evictions
Number of Prefetch entries allocated. MLC_Pref = DRD_pref/CRD_pref/RFO_pref
Number of Evictions allocated (WbMtoI with ExtCmp =0)
Total Non-Coherent Read requests received by iMPH (DRd/CRd/PRd.CRd_UC/UCRdF/RdCUrr)
Total Non-Coherent Write requests received by iMPH

Each cycle count number of valid entries in Coherency Tracker queue from allocation till deallocation. Aperture requests (snoops) appear as NC decoded internally and become coherent (snoop LLC, access memory)
Number of entries allocated. Account for Any type: e.g. Snoop,  etc
Number of conflicts with ReqTrk
Address conflict when consecutive IO request originated from save device reach COH tracker (that 2nd is allocated but in sleep mode)

Each cycle count number of all CmpTrk valid entries

Account for any reject in this queue. E.g. in addition to next reject-types (having dedicated sub-events) no-tracker-credits, set match (includes many conditions incl. victim pending), All ways reserved, ?

Account for any reject in this queue. E.g. set-match, no-tracker-credits, All ways reserved, AckCnflt-pending, victim entry occupied, etc.. in addition to below mentioned common reject-types (having dedicated sub-events)
Count 1 if more than 1 reject reason is applied

Physical Address (PA) match. Does not account for set-match
